summary: This is a Mod / Guide to make every skyrim guy and gal look real and well.... HOT! The HOT Mess file contains some of the best work the nexus has to offer. all combined. for a short list EEO, all my works, Eries omas raht. Mature skin complex and CMO complex, all patched for USLEEP.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]

SEE IMAGES AND VIDEOS TAB! LIKE WHAT YOU SEE? READ ON.[/size]


(UPDATES)
see sticky

[size=4](WHAT THIS IS)[/size]
This started as proper guide to get all NPC's to look amazing while sticking to a guide style format HOT Mess is basicly a mod in and of its self now... I have focused heavily on getting the permissions to make all these mods work together. This will make NPC look realer and have body physics. This will not "make your NPC's look like 16 year old girls" you can how ever install mods that do that after this if you would like..

[size=4](WHY I DID THIS)[/size]
Now the reason for this list is simple. After all the mods i have used the biggest folder i have is for the toons looks.. If you type CBBE or UNP in nexus you will see 200 some odd files pop up. click on one and they have 3 or more options to choose from. also most of the time you cant just install "a mod". you end up needing 10 for one :) making you install a decent amount of mods before you can stop without messing it all up. This can make someone who is new to mods head start spinning. My goal has and always will be to help out new moders on the nexus and make it easy for the great work these Authors provide to be found and used. 

[size=4](CONFLICTS)

Anything that edits the beast races will screw this mod up also anything that messes with NPC facegen or adds weapons/armor to them. This mod should be loaded after weapons - armors and and race changes till I make a patch.. If you want to use another mod like warmaidens or Serana and family just install it after this and load its .esp after this. I will be making patches soon but after almost 2 months of working on this I think im going to take a break for a few days.
[/size]

[size=4](THINGS NEEDED)[/size]
All DLC other than that around 6k or more vram. All other things needed are listed in a nice guide for you.

[size=4](HOW TO BE COOL LIKE ME!)[/size]
I will be going step by step by, you get the point.. Please follow every step and install these mods in order. If you dont it could kill baby kittens world wide! A step can only  be skipped you have it already or its Optional.  Also if you have any mods altering your toons already i would uninstall them. if you dont who knows what they will look like when done. If you use these mods plz endorse them. and me as well if you like this Guide :)
[size=4]
If your a user of my landscape guide please skip straight to STEP5[/size]

[size=4]STEP1 Download this [/size][url=http://enbdev.com/download_vramsizetest.htm][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]vram testing tool[/size][/color][/u][/url][size=4] from boris at ENB.. This will let you know what braket you fall into on my guide! After download open it and run the DX9 version now follow the guide based on the numbers you see. "[/size][color=#ff0000][size=4]A[/size][/color][size=4]" will be listed by everthing for people with a vram limit at around 6000. "[/size][color=#6aa84f][size=4]B[/size][/color][size=4]" options will be for 6000 to 8000+ Users.  Please "if your vram is 4064" do not use this will any landscape mods. You will likely run out of vram.. If its even less than that you cant use any of this. If you do its not going to end well for the kittens. There will also be some mods with [/size][color=#ffff00][size=4]Optional [/size][/color][size=4]These can be skipped if you don't want them.[/size]

STEP2 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) Install newest [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] (extends your script allowing mods to add new things actions and such) If you have this plz skip it

STEP3 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]Sky UI[/url] latest version (mainly for the added in game mod config menu, it can be found under settings in ame after installing. provided you have a mod that needs it) If you have this plz skip it

STEP4 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color])  Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40706/?]OneTweak[/url] click install. (skip only if you have it)

STEP5 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?] RaceMenu [/url]click install.

STEP6 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601]Realistic Ragdolls and Force[/url] realistic force version 1.9 (makes you die right and other things but is important and requierd for hdt)

STEP7 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) "Warning not a work safe link" Install [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/498-sos-schlongs-of-skyrim/]Schlongs of Skyrim by VectorPlexus and Smurf[/url] You will need the FULL version for this to work right! Add it to your manager by using the + icon in the top left of NMM. Click install, default body, Regular Schlong, and Male skeleton. yes to all when asked to overwrite.

STEP8 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996]HDT Physics Extentions[/url] and install

STEP9 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?] XPMSE[/url] latest version,click install. Hit next 2 times select the sos plugin, hit next 3 times deselect all the skeletons in this section. hit next 2 times then finish..

STEP10 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP[/url] base body, click install.

STEP11 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21199/?]UNP HDT-PE BBP TBBP[/url] click install, yes to all.

STEP12 "Warning link not work friendly" Download [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1306-eires-ohmes-raht-khajiit-replacer/]eires-ohmes-raht-khajiit-replacer[/url] once done open it. Move both the Texture file and meshes file to your desktop. Now highlight them both right click them and pack them with your zip program be sure to name it so you will know what it is.. Open up NMM if it isnt already and hitthe + in the upper left. Now add the file you just zipped from your desktop and delete all the files you have on your desktop afterward. clink install yes to all.

STEP13 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) Download  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by [b]Apachii[/b][/url] Your going to need the 1.6 full version at the top. Other mods may require more an you can of course add them if you wish.

STEP14 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31552/?]Horned Hairstyles by [b]Ertos[/b][/url] main file click install.

STEP15 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70481/?]Masculine Khajiit Textures by [b]MONSTERaider[/b][/url] SOS full version.. pick what you like click install

STEP16 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70164/?]Masculine Argonian Textures by [b]MONSTERaider[/b][/url] SOS full version.. Click to install you want lizard and more scales options or the patch i have made wont look right

STEP17  HOT Mess ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) Download and install my HOT Mess files p1 and p2 and install them in that order. click install, yes to all. Below is a list of all the mods included in this plz endorse them. My thanks to them for giving permissions to use thier mods to others and or ME SPECIFICLY.. This allowed me to make every mod in the list be combined and work together seamlessly and gave you some 1k options that didnt exist before. Give credit were its due plz and endorse the mods listed below. With out their assets this wouldn't exist. If the mod has just a [color=#6aa84f]Optional[/color] by it you can get higher rez options if you would like B users A should just stick with the main file. But to be quite frank all the rez options I have a perfect for playing skyrim on a day to day..

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?]Ethereal Elven Overhaul by [b]nuska [/b][/url][b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46067/?]Patches from Thordir[/url][/b]

Catlike Khajiit "male head mesh"

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37022/?]FemFeet Redesigned by [b]Leito8[/b][/url][b]6[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28491/?]Better Vanilla Hairs by [b]kebrus[/b][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13173/?]elf ear by [b]numenume[/b][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7127/?]RANs HeadMesh Variant by [b]RAN46[/b][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]
[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31332/?]Weathered and Worn Warpaint by [b]Diethardt[/b][/url] 2k [color=#ffff00]Optional
[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE by [b]Diethardt[/b][/url] 2k [color=#ffff00]Optional
[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49285/?]Feminine Hands CBBE UNP[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7305/?]UNP Female Armors
[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture by [b]Maevan2[/b][/url] 4k [color=#ffff00]Optional
[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54568/?]Complete Male Overhaul by [b]Mok Chaoticran[/b][/url] Diffrent body styles [color=#ffff00]Optional
[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD by [b]zzjay[/b][/url] 1k [color=#ffff00]Optional
[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty by Longarm
[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35092/?]ApachiiSkyHair natural Retexture by [b]Hein84[/b][/url] 2k [color=#ffff00]Optional

[/color]STEP18 Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63353/?]RUSTIC CHILDREN by [b]Gamwich[/b][/url] click install yes to all if asked.

STEP19 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) (Makes all the girls move like girls) Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54521/?]FNIS Sexy Move[/url] and install it. When in game, go to the mod config menu under settings and find FNIS sexy move. select armored moves less sexy so your not fighting a princess in full plate. OPTIONAL:leave this setting alone less lore friendly.

STEP20 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) (if you have this plz skip it and just run it to update) Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?]FNIS[/url] get main file and install it. Now go to your Skyrim data folder, find the folder named "tools" click it. Now click GenerateFNIS_for_Users, then RIGHT click! "GenerateFNISforUsers.exe" and run it as admin. Check the Skeloton arm fix and click update fnis. creat a shortcut when promted this will need to be ran everytime you change a mod "i run it every time anyways just to be safe" (allows new animations and idles to be used in Skyrim)

See article tab for load order issues

                                                                                  (HDT Physics All Over!)

STEP1 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]KS Hairdos - HDT Physics by [b]Stealthic and Kalilies[/b][/url] You will want the BBP fix and the main file. Install the main file save the BBP.

STEP2 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?]Dual Sheath Redux by [b]Neovalen[/b][/url] main file click install yes to all.

STEP3 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57852/?]HDT Equipment V0.2 for Everyone by [b]Carloss32[/b][/url] Click install yes to all. Now install the BBP fix you got from HDT KS hair.

STEP4 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58418/?]Pretty Staff And Magic Cast Animations by [b]Dualsun[/b][/url] click install yes to all

STEP5 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15703/?]Pretty Combat Animationsby [b]dualsun[/b][/url]  hit next 3 times then select crossbow, hit next, select bow, hit next, select bow, hit next, select both bow, hit next, select slayer, hit next select warrior, hit next, select block and sprint, hit next, hit next, if you plan to use magic in one and and spells in the other select the first option, if you plan to use 2 swords select the second option. if your using this for followers mainly then option 2 may make more sense. Hit next, select skip, hit next select block and sprint.

STEP6 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection by[b] Tiwa44[/b][/url] BBP version. Click install yes to all.

STEP7 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68028/?]UNP Spice Gear Collection by [b]tiwa44[/b][/url] You want the BBP version. Click install yes to all.

STEP8 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573/?tb=mods&pUp=1]nsk13[/url] Has the best armors I have seen for females with BBP.. You just got to try them your self. You will need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HTD High Heels
[/url]for most of them to work though so install it first if you want his armors.

STEP9 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72581/?]Illustrious HDT Cloaks of Skyrim by [b]Euphy aka EuphoricKnave[/b][/url] requires the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/?]Cloaks of Skyrim by [b]Noodles
[/b][/url]
STEP10 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color])  Rerun FINIS like in step 20..                                                                             

                                                                                (CREATURES OF THE NIGHT)
                                 Mostly coverd by HOT Mess.. These will further enchance the changes i have made.

STEP1 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22522/?]Female Vampires Have Fangs by [b]Acdale[/b][/url] click install.

STEP1 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41634/?]DVA Dynamic Vampire Appearance by [b]Aipex8 and TaikoDragon[/b][/url] Click install.

STEP1 ([color=#ff0000]A[/color],[color=#6aa84f]B[/color]) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55502/?]Realistic Vampire Eyes by [b]TheGreatHim[/b][/url][b] Clik install, Yes to all[/b].


(Fixes)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23916/?]Invisibility Glitch - Eyes Fix by [b]KingsGambit[/b][/url] install this if your eyes glitch out and go dark side

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65538/?]Prisoner cart fix by [b]kaliban71[/b][/url] install this if the carts go crazy at the start of your game..


(MODS I USE WITH THESE)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8429/?]Interesting NPCs[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36334/?]
Iconsequential NPCs
[/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]AFT
[/url]

(KNOWN ISSUES)

THE PURE GREATNESS OF MY NPC'S NOW BURNS MY EYES! "There is no fix for this"..

Crashing druing civilwar or mods that add a lot of npc to it and or the game in general. All I can tell you is you can try lighter versions of all skin textures. I use 2k its the perfect size. I would run everything on vanilla before I toned anything down on this guide. The actors make the game.. I cant live with them looking like they crawled out a dead skeever.

HDT "or Physics in general" Has a known issue were it can go a little nuts if your skyrim gets stressed and you may see a cloak sail from a back to the moon.This is not fixable. also clipping is to be expected with some hdt effects.

The female Khajiit don't have proper tints and face paints. Ill be making this but for now im taking a much needed brake.

(THANKS)

A special thanks to the modders who made my HOT Mess file Possible. Thanks to them I was able to make a seamless overhaul of 90% of the game with a click!
author: djtalks

files.name: HOT Mess p1
files.changelogHtml:
First installment of my ocerhual pack known as hot mess.
chenged all elf and beast reaces head modles. elves have better ears for females and beast look more human. male khajit have a slight improved look but nothing big females and both male and female argonians is way more drastic.
adds new hd textures to eyes, mouth, war paint, dirt, skin, and hair.. Everything that isnt coverd you are told to get in the guide as needed.

First installment of my ocerhual pack known as hot mess.
chenged all elf and beast reaces head modles. elves have better ears for females and beast look more human. male khajit have a slight improved look but nothing big females and both male and female argonians is way more drastic.
adds new hd textures to eyes, mouth, war paint, dirt, skin, and hair.. Everything that isnt coverd you are told to get in the guide as needed.
